name: Cube Glider
description:
A game about a cube avoiding randomly generated objects for 60 seconds.

Its a simple game I made, it has different difficultys(levels) and each level works in a different way. If you want to leave a level you have to Alt+F4, for now.

There are some missing features and bad visuals ,but don't worry, I'll add and fix those in the next updates. 

Hope you like it. :)
